main.description: Official Santempi website - Health information system for low-resource settings

ProductOverview.Summary: Santempi is an open-source health information system designed specifically for low-resource healthcare settings.
ProductOverview.Description: Santempi provides comprehensive health information management capabilities including patient registration, clinical documentation, pharmacy management, and reporting. It is designed to be lightweight and suitable for facilities with limited resources and technical infrastructure.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Comprehensive health information system for low-resource healthcare facilities
ProductOverview.Users: Healthcare providers, nurses, pharmacists, and administrative staff in low-resource settings

Reach.SummaryOfReach: Santempi has been implemented in various low-resource healthcare facilities to support health information management and patient care.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: Santempi is developed and maintained by a global community focused on health information systems for low-resource settings.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: Santempi
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source health information system for low-resource settings

Sustainability.Description: Santempi is supported through open source development and community contributions.
